ygData.subject: Re: Selling to Krak?
ygData.msgSnippet: The way to tell if sneak works successfully is if you start moving real slow...  I used sneak to sell to the Goblin Merchant near the King Room in Sol A.  My
ygData.messageBody:
The way to tell if sneak works successfully is if you start moving real
slow... I used sneak to sell to the Goblin Merchant near the King Room in
Sol A. My sneak is pretty low - so it usually took me about 5-10 times
before it took.

Slyde

From: "James Schuldes" <jgs@...>

Subject: RE: [eqbards] Selling to Krak?
